related_questions.snippet: A solar cell is an electronic device which directly converts sunlight into electricity. ... related_questions.question: How does solar panel work PDF?
related_questions.snippet: Solar panels work by absorbing sunlight with photovoltaic cells, generating direct current (DC) energy and then converting it to usable alternating current (AC) energy with the help of inverter technology.
